The sex was... kinda spontaneous. That ending had me worrying though. It's not that it's wrong but if what they imply that some parts of their relationship is bad, it will be unhealthy to their bonds in the long term. That's the part that had me worrying so they, or Onii-chan, seriously need to have a long talk with each other, assess and confirm about their relationship (there are obviously faults with my ideas, work with me here). In this chapter, they or only Shou(?) recognized a defining problem aroused after 3 years of their secret, private relationship, and Onii-chan/Shou started showing signs of ruining himself over it. This is not a weird thing for men (not the odd incest case) as they're much prone to this because they bottle up their feelings. If this keeps up and he keeps feeling guilt over it until he can't bottle it anymore, he'll have a mental breakdown (like depression finally breaking a man but in this case it's guilt). I know they resolved it immediately but it would
This incest sex story has more character growth and development than many mainstream romance anime and manga lmfao.

The feeling isn’t love, or one being apart of the other, it is purely lust, lusting after the opposite gender’s body, and when it is a sister, that would be the closest person you can easily bond with and trust who can trust you and keep secrets. It is merely, a situation of pure confusion and hormones being put forth and using them to their utmost of features. Therefore, (aka TLDR) since they truly don’t love each other (in a lovers sense) but rather a family sense, it is just confusion, hormones, and lust.
